question: The Government of India recognizes 7-9 January as the Pravasi Bharatiya Divas since 2003 . Which of the following events is known to occur on 9 January?
option1: Arrival of Mahatma Gandhi in India from South Africa.
option2: Launch of Person of Indian Origin Card (PIO Card)
option3: First Global Convention of People of Indian Origin in New York
answer: Arrival of Mahatma Gandhi in India from South Africa.
explanation: Pravasi Bharatiya Divas is celebrated every year on 9th January. The main purpose of celebrating this event is to mark the contribution of the overseas Indian community for the development of India. On that day in 1915, Mahatma Gandhi returned from South Africa to Mumbai
